gameview.sView

Class SGMapSettingPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gameview.sView.SGMapSettingPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SGMapSettingPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel to display a map Preview and infos about the ticket types and the max figure count. The number of players and the number of specialtickets can be set.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Raphael A.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener action)
        Adds the local actionListener to evry component.
        Parameters:
        action - action listener

      • checkNumberOfPlayer

        public void checkNumberOfPlayer()
        This method checks if there are to less start positions for 4,3 or 2 players. If there are only 2 startpositions there can only be 2 players. If there less the 2 the map cannot be played.

      • getInfoBox

        public javax.swing.JComponent getInfoBox()
        Returns the configured infoBox. This contains the ticket types and the max figure count
        Returns:
        infoBox Box with information about a map

      • getMapPreviewBox

        public javax.swing.JComponent getMapPreviewBox()
        This method sets the mapPreviewBox
        Returns:
        mapPreviewBox Box for map preview

      • getPlayerNumberBox

        public javax.swing.JComponent getPlayerNumberBox()
        Get the player number box
        Returns:
        playerNumberBox Box with number of players

      • getShowThiefBox

        public javax.swing.JComponent getShowThiefBox()
        This method returns the configured "showthiefbox" whiche contents the checkbox for the possible thief position function
        Returns:
        showThiefBox Box with show thief option

      • getSpecialTicketArray

        public java.lang.Integer[] getSpecialTicketArray()
        Returns the specialTicketArray which contains the count of evry
        Returns:
        array with number of special tickets

      • getTicketChooseBox

        public javax.swing.JComponent getTicketChooseBox()
        This method return's the ticketChooseBox, which includes the specialticket choose boxes.
        Returns:
        ticketChooseBox Box for special ticket choosing

      • init

        public void init()
        The init method which initializes every element.

      • maxFiguresSet

        public void maxFiguresSet()
        When the DATA_MAP_DATA event is processed this method writes the html String with the max figure count from the current config. The Label tickets will also be added to the ticketTypeBox.

      • processEvent

        public void processEvent(IAEvent event)
        processes the language and Data_Map_Data event which deliveres the chosen map(image) and the map informations from the .ini file.
        Parameters:
        event - A event

      • switchLanguage

        public void switchLanguage(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> language)
        This method changes every element title or text to the current language if requested.
        Parameters:
        language - Map with language data

      • switchTicketLanguage

        public void switchTicketLanguage(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> language)
        This method switches the ticket language.
        Parameters:
        language - Map with language data

      • ticketTypeSet

        public void ticketTypeSet()
        When the DATA_MAP_DATA event is processed this method writes the html String with ticket types from the current config. The Label tickets will also be added to the ticketTypeBox.
